name: CreepyDodge - Demo
description:
CreepyDodge

Welcome, Candidate 18,931,846. Your job is simple. Survive for as long as possible by dodging the monsters! Yes, you are just a number to us, but we believe that you have entertainment value.

Features:

• No ads

• No in-app purchases and no-paywall

• You will have the choice to resume the game from where you left off.

• You can share your time with your friends in the hopes that they will become candidates and try to beat your time. The more the merrier!

For the full version visit: https://retroretrogames.itch.io/creepydodge-full
